Room.Name: Southern Courtyard
Room.ShortDescription: You are directly south of the great statue of King Lyanden.
Room.LongDescription: Further south is a tranquil rest area surrounded by trees and a hedge. This part of the courtyard is often used as an area for falcon training, and falconeers come here to show off and trade their birds of prey. A coop of pigeons stands off to the side, with a number of unsuspecting birds inside. A hedge blocks the way to the east, but looking west you can see the castle's garden.
